title: 820-2936 sometimes does not wake from sleep
message:
This machine was water damaged. ISL 6259 was replaced and battery current sensing was repaired. Overall, damage was minimal. It now passes ASD EFI without issue and runs well. Only hardware that has been changed is HDD has been replaced by non-Apple SSD. 

Sometimes, when the machine is allowed to idle for about 30 minutes, it will not wake up from sleep. It becomes completely unresponsive to normal inputs from the keyboard (including power button) and mouse. What always fixes the problem is to do an SMC reset (left shift + left option + control + power button). The machine runs completely fine other than this one problem. 

What could be causing this?

title: 820-2936 sometimes does not wake from sleep
820-2936 sometimes does not wake from sleep
message: It was corrosion on the battery light indicator. Board was fine. Thanks!

title: 820-2936 sometimes does not wake from sleep
message: SMC_LID affected by corrosion then; Hall sensor is placed there...
